subscription.slogan: Write the story of your life
subscription.features:
One day, one story
365+ topics to complete
You own your information
Share with your loved ones
subscription.terms: Yester offers a 1-Month FREE trial with the selection of a subscription option - Monthly plan. When selecting a plan, you will not be charged during the free trial period. If you do not cancel the subscription 24-hours before the current period or free trial is up, the subscription plan will auto-renew and your account will be charged. Please see Apple's auto-renewing subscription details for more information. All of Yester's subscription plans provide FULL access to the above features and ALL future updates. Cancel at anytime. For more information, please see our
